cars.description: With this pastel purple Morris Minor Series II, you'll never lose your car in the parking lot.
You could haul something in this Task Force. Or you could make all your friends and enemies yellow with envy.
This car isn't actually an Oldsmobile, but it's the only pastel orange car I could find and I couldn't find the make or model. I do know for a fact that it's not an Oldsmobile, though.
And she'll have fun fun fun/'til her daddy takes the T-bird away.
